title: Voucher Trading System Application Programming Interface (VTS-API)
abstract:
This document specifies the Voucher Trading System Application
Programming Interface (VTS-API).  The VTS-API allows a wallet or other
application to issue, transfer, and redeem vouchers in a uniform
manner independent of the VTS implementation.  The VTS is a system for
securely transferring vouchers; e.g., coupons, tickets, loyalty points,
and gift certificates.  This process is often necessary in the course
of payment and/or delivery transactions.  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
